name: X-Pro® PP 4910
description:
X-Pro® PP 4910 is a general-purpose, lower melt flow, no break, 98% recycled content, polypropylene copolymer suitable for injection molding applications. It provides a low-cost alternative to virgin resin while maintaining comparable quality and processability. 

Produced from: post industrial recycled polypropylene 

Color: Black 

Applications: 


	Composite Wheels 
	protective guarding 
	lawn and garden 
	automotive 
	industrial 
	construction 


Processing Method: Injection molding 


	Melt Flow: 8 -12 g/10 min 
	Izod Impact - 44 min KJ/M2 
	Tensile @ Yield - 21 min MPa 
	Flexural Modulus 0.05 in / min - 828 min 
	Ash Content - <5%
